identified_risks.risk_description: Limited cloud expertise within current IT team may cause implementation delays
identified_risks.response_actions: Accelerate AWS training for key team members, engage Alex Thompson (Cloud Architect) earlier, and create knowledge transfer plan to build internal expertise
Implement data replication solution, conduct multiple practice migrations, optimize migration scripts, and prepare rollback procedures

identified_risks.risk_description: Key personnel departure (Jennifer Taylor leaving Sept 1)
identified_risks.response_actions: Document all requirements and knowledge before departure, identify replacement, and ensure overlap period for knowledge transfer

identified_risks.risk_description: Legacy applications incompatible with cloud environment
identified_risks.response_actions: Conduct early compatibility assessment, plan for application modifications, test in cloud environment early, and prepare contingency for problematic components

identified_risks.risk_description: Security compliance requirements not met in cloud environment
identified_risks.response_actions: Engage compliance officer early, document all security controls, conduct pre-migration compliance assessment, and implement additional security measures as needed

identified_risks.risk_description: Cloud architect contractor only available for 4 months
identified_risks.response_actions: Prioritize critical architecture decisions during availability window, create detailed documentation, and develop knowledge transfer plan to internal team members

identified_risks.risk_description: Integration with third-party systems fails after migration
identified_risks.response_actions: Map all integration points, engage third-party vendors early, test integrations in staging environment, and prepare fallback options for critical integrations
Implement strict budget monitoring, prioritize critical components, identify potential cost-cutting areas, and establish approval process for any scope changes
Establish performance baselines, conduct load testing in cloud environment, optimize database queries, and implement performance monitoring tools

identified_risks.risk_description: Schedule delays due to competing priorities (security audit in July)
identified_risks.response_actions: Adjust project schedule to accommodate known conflicts, secure firm commitments from stakeholders, and identify backup resources for critical roles
Implement comprehensive backup strategy, verify data integrity before and after migration, and establish point-in-time recovery capabilities
Engage procurement team early, establish clear contract requirements, identify alternative cloud providers as backup, and prepare for potential start date adjustments
